H0.text: What is someone allergic to if they have coeliac disease. Lactose

H1.text: What is someone allergic to if they have coeliac disease. Casein

H2.text: What is someone allergic to if they have coeliac disease. Lectin

H3.text: What is someone allergic to if they have coeliac disease. Glutin

A4.text: Coeliac disease is caused by an abnormal immune system response to gluten, found in wheat and other grains such as barley and rye.
